thread.title: Cao Lu On Giving Back To Parents Despite Not Making Much Money With FIESTAR
thread.title_full: Cao Lu On Giving Back To Parents Despite Not Making Much Money With FIESTAR

author: boxclub
title: Cao Lu On Giving Back To Parents Despite Not Making Much Money With FIESTAR
text:
The recent January 28 episode of “Ask Us Anything” featured a hilarious “Ladies Who Know Seollal” special with Park Mi Sun , Jo Hye Ryun , Solbi, and Hong Jin Young returning from the Chuseok special, joined by Oh Na Mi , APRIL’s Yoon Chaeyung, and FIESTAR’s Cao Lu . 
During the episode, Cao Lu brought up her group FIESTAR. Despite nearing their fifth year anniversary as an idol group, she revealed that the group still has not turned a profit yet, saying that she hasn’t been able to send money home to her parents. 
She confessed, “Actually, my agency doesn’t like it when I say things like this but although we’ve passed four years as a group, we haven’t made any income. But since I was on a few talk shows last year, we did make some profit but it isn’t enough.” 
However, Cao Lu showed that she is nonetheless a faithful daughter, revealing that when she was younger, she had been able to give a big present to her parents. 
She revealed, “When I was 17, I bought an apartment in Beijing. I was lucky and as soon as I debuted, I won the newbie award from CCTV. As I was promoting for two years, I was thinking of buying a car but my mom told me to buy a house so I did.” 
Cao Lu continued, “The price of the apartment has gone up a lot but when I bought it, it was inexpensive. The price has gone up about five times now. During the summers, my parents go to live there.”
